Class MeleeWeapon

java.lang.Object
item.Item
item.Weapon
item.MeleeWeapon
Direct Known Subclasses:
Spear, Sword
public abstract class MeleeWeapon extends Weapon
MeleeWeapon Represents a melee weapon in the game

      damage - damage of the weapon
      XSpeedMultiplier - X speed multiplier of the weapon

      canMultipleHit - can multiple hit or not

      protected boolean isEnemy(Entity entity, Entity attacker)
      Check if the attacker and the entity are enemies
      Parameters:
      entity - the entity that is being attacked
      attacker - the entity that is attacking
      Returns:
